div.div:
When a pause exceeds 6000 us, a pauseDetected event is sent. (otherwise, with a flexible amount of bytes, the necReceiver would not know very soon that no new bits are coming)
T_MAX_PAUSE_US = 6000

switch.text: When a pause exceeds 6000 us, a pauseDetected e...
